{"step_by_step_thinking": "Peau d'Orange of the breast refers to the appearance of the skin resembling the texture of an orange peel. This condition is typically associated with breast cancer. The characteristic appearance is caused by the infiltration of cancer cells into the lymphatic vessels and lymph nodes, leading to obstruction of lymphatic ducts. Therefore, the correct answer is B. Obstruction of lymphatic ducts.", "answer_choice": "B"}
